description: female doll; seated with hands held in front of body, palms inward; white face and hands; long black hair tied back with several ribbons; gold head piece; wearing elaborate multicolored clothing, predominantly orange, red and gold; seated on light green plastic "bamboo" and multicolored dias which fits on top of black plastic base with gold floral ornamentation on front
dimension: 7 1/2 x 9 x 7 in. (19.05 x 22.86 x 17.78 cm) (single element, doll)
title: Female Doll, from a Set of Hina Dolls
